name: SCHIZO (Karbonated)
description:
"As well as being one of the worst things that can happen to a human being, schizophrenia can also be one of the richest learning and humanizing experiences life offers."
— Mark Vonnegut

This Game is best played with headphones, alone, and in a dark environment.

SCHIZO is a short game about Schizophrenia and a remake of my previous game "Man of Misery" which was also about Schizophrenia, only this time it's a much better experience.

Explore the mind of a Schizophrenic.

You can still try Man of Misery here, though I recommend playing SCHIZO first.

Controls:

  • WASD: for movement
  • E: for interaction
  • F: to turn the flashlight ON/OFF
  • Mouse: for camera

Enjoy!
